text: Consider the following code: Ttorigl = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8); // ints are 4 bytes wide int main () { int *backup, *copy, **copyH; backup = copy = (int*) malloc (sizeof (int) * 100); copyH = © For (inti=0; < 2; i++) { *eopy = orig [i]; * copyH = *copyH + 4; } } In the above code, right before the “for loop”, which variable allocate at which memory area? (#) orig — Static, backup — Stack, copyH - Stack (b) orig - Stack, backup — Stack, copyH ~ Heap (c) orig - Static, backup — Heap, copyH - Stack (d) orig - Stack, backup — Heap, copyH - Stack
